Fire Department

In an emergency please call 911

77 French Village Road
Kingsclear First Nation, NB
E3E 1J5

Douglas Paul, Fire Chief
Tel: (506) 363-4574
Fax: (506) 363-4324
Twitter: @kfnfd101
kfnfd101@gmail.com

Hours of Operation

The Fire Department is available 24/7, 365 days/year for emergencies.

General Information and Services

The Kingsclear Fire Department provides fire suppression for the Kingsclear First Nation community, medical first response, and rescue services.

The Fire Department meets every Monday at 6:00PM.

Volunteer Fire Department Members:
